title: Intermediate German III
description: A course designed for students who wish to improve their ability to speak and write German. Students will read and discuss a variety of texts and films, and complete the grammar review begun in 2A. 2C emphasizes speaking, writing, and critical thinking, and prepares students for upper-division course work in German.  Prerequisites:  LTGM 2B or equivalent or score of 5 on AP German language exam or consent of instructor.
